price: ហេតុនេះ ចូរអ្នកអំពាវនាវដោយចំហនូវអ្វី(សាររបស់ អល់ឡោះ)ដែលគេ(អល់ឡោះ)បញ្ជា ហើយចូរអ្នកងាកចេញ ពីពួកមូស្ហរីគីន។
arabic: فَٱصۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'daʿ bimā tu'maru wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-mush'rikīna
